issue.title: www.finn.no

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.finn.no/bap/forsale/ad.html?finnkode=353650093](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.finn.no%2Fbap%2Fforsale%2Fad.html%3Ffinnkode%3D353650093) ### Comment > Dandelion Sprout’s Nordic filters > > https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DandelionSprout/adfilt/master/NorwegianExperimentalList%20alternate%20versions/NordicFiltersAdGuard.txt > > (And Adguard Mobile Ads filter as well) > > Causes problems on Norwegian marketsite «Finn.no». Breaking the site, not being able to show the listings/items for sale. They are blocked from viewing. The page is viewable again by turning off these to filter lists. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/pvrdmnhv180s48sg04oc8ogw80gssggoy6xw0320us.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/6yy2cpgy8wkckkwgk8s44ccw8okwwswgkwptbghr2o.jpg?nc=1)
